hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is dave in this episode
1507 a and today's date is February 26
2018 and the top of the episode is
economic indicators are being triggered
signaling a major bear market let's get
into the economic collapse financial
news now over the many many reports we
talk about manipulation on how they
manipulate the statistics to make us
believe that everything is fantastic
like the unemployment numbers where
they're saying that the unemployment
numbers are around you know four or four
point one percent around that range and
we're at full employment right now and
over the many many years since the 2008
financial crisis and even before that
they have been manipulating the
unemployment numbers and basically not
counting those individuals they can't
find a job and of course they're saying
that that's not true but it's turning
out and this is coming from a Fed report
saying that listen most of the
working-age men will never return to the
labor force those individuals that
haven't found jobs well they're pretty
much out of luck and we can see that
this trend has accelerated over time
where they said the middle class was
being lost and it has been lost now the
labor force participation rate for prime
aged men 25 to 54 has declined
dramatically in the u.s. since the 60s
but in the last couple of years it is
accelerated and it has intensified and
we could see right now in 1996 there
were four point six million prime aged
men did not participate in the labor
force by 2016 this number is now at 7.1
million and continually rising and if
you look at this you could see that the
entire middle class has been wiped out
completely and what they're saying is
that these jobs well they're not coming
back once they're lost most of them
they're not going to see a return of
these type of jobs and we see at this
point this is why they wanted
illegals coming into this country
because they realized the only jobs in
this country and they were setting it up
and getting prepared for a third-world
nation that was their entire plan now
what we need to do is we need to start
creating some of these jobs how do we do
this well the Fed can't do it
we just can't create currency and create
jobs we have to bring some form of
manufacturing some type of production
back to this country
that is the only way we need to increase
trade trade items that we produce here
in this country and we can see this is
the path that we're on right now but it
is a long path and there are other
forces that are stopping this from
happening at the same time this is all
happening we see that there are
different indicators all around us
showing us that there are signs that
this economy is not doing well at all
and it's deteriorating very very quickly
and we know that the housing market
right now well it is not doing well at
all the housing market is doing terribly
yes they have the 20 cities yes they can
blow up the bubbles we know that Fannie
and Freddie they're asking for a bailout
already and the whole thing is a
complete mess actually
we're back to where we were prior to
2008 there's really no difference the
big difference is is that they created
the situation to be even worse than it
was back in 2008 of course they're not
acknowledging this yet but eventually
what will happen is that all this
information will come out eventually and
people will be looking at it just like
they did in 2008 when everyone believed
that the real estate market was
continually move up and everything was
going to be great the subprime
securities were triple-a everyone's
going to be looking back at all of this
saying how did we get here and of course
we've been mapping this we've been
watching it and we can see and we know
exactly how we got here because the
whole thing has been one gigantic
illusion now Fannie and Fred
they guarantee around four trillion in
residential mortgages accounting for
some forty percent of the US market and
Fannie and Freddie today they are broke
remember back during the financial
crisis they were bailed out at the tune
of about a hundred and eighty seven
billion dollars from the taxpayers
they were nationalized at this point the
Senate tried to replace these two
because they knew that this whole thing
was ridiculous nothing was solved but
that failed that plan completely failed
and they kept them in place and now
they're completely broke they need
another bailout the housing industry is
a house of cards waiting to come down
and the entire financial system is based
upon this because once the housing
market comes down there are so many
things that are interconnected with the
housing market especially the everyday
person when the housing market is
increasing in value people have
confidence they feel good about it they
say you know something my house is now
worth you know three hundred thousand or
five hundred thousand or seven hundred
thousand even though it's on paper and
the only way you can collect is by
selling your home or taking or taking
out a home equity line of credit but
that's not really your money you have to
pay it back so people have this false
sense of security when the housing
market comes down that sense of security
completely disappears and what that
means is people don't go out and say hey
I'm gonna spend money because my house
has gone up in value they kind of keep
all their funds they don't like to spend
anything they get very nervous and
afraid and that hurts retail that hurt
the restaurant industry that hurts
everything and then all of a sudden what
happens is people see the housing prices
coming down they don't want to purchase
homes that hurts the lumber industry
that hurts the electricians the plumbers
the construction workers you name it it
affects almost everything this is why
the Fed understands or realizes they
need to continually pump up the bubble
to make it look like housing is doing a
lot better than a real
and this is what they did prior to 2008
until that until the whole thing started
to fall apart
this is what they've been doing to 20
cities that they keep reporting on
saying that the housing prices are going
up because once you hear that you feel
really good about it but outside the 20
cities a lot of people well up they're
having a very difficult difficult time
selling their homes or getting the price
that they want they're lowering the
prices and we could see right now that
the housing market is not doing well as
as everyone thinks it is we see existing
home sales new construction all
declining right now we also see that
Bank of America is out there and saying
listen 13 of the 19 bear market
indicators have been triggered now let's
go back a month ago just as the SP hit

indicators created by the Bank of
America Kwan's was just triggered and we
can see that once they came out with

the market and it was pretty darn
accurate it was correct on eleven out of
the 11 previous occasions that it was
triggered that something was going to
happen there was going to be some type
of Correction and there actually was
fast forward to today guess what well
they're saying that their crash
indicator was triggered once again and
they're saying that we are much closer
to a major disaster another two
indicators have been triggered meeting
that no less than 13 of the 19 bear
market signposts are now flashing red
and this tells us that were headed
towards something really really big and
they're saying that this might occur in
the March time frame so we'll have to
watch this very carefully because when
we look back in time we can see that
every time there was a trigger of their
signal that tells you that there's going
to be a bear market
all of a sudden the market came down and
it looks like we have hit that once
again and like I said once this start to

high-frequency traders they will do

what the whole thing comes tumbling down
and they will not be able to stop at
this time they will try but it will

once that happens other things are going
to occur just like it did back in 2008
we're gonna see corporations saying you

know something we're gonna have to cut

right now they want the system down they
want to place more pressure on Trump as
you can see they have their event moving

narrative they're keeping the new cycle
busy with what is going on if they can
bring down the economy that would add to

they're trying to do they're trying to
push us as hard as they possibly can now
it's very interesting we know that
Puerto Rico is having a very difficult

Reserve Bank of New York William C
Dudley held a press conference to
effectively tell Puerto Ricans to suck
it up as they attempt to recover from
the humanitarian crisis caused by the

and everything else and we could see
right now that they really don't care
about what happens there as long as they
get paid on their debt and we see right
now this is a good example of how the
Federal Reserve will react when there
are problems in the country their first
order of business
is to make sure they can get repayment
of their debt or their interest payments
everything else they could care less
they could care less about anything else
that happens in this country because
remember central bankers they have no
allegiance to a people a group a country
the allegiance is to themselves and we
could see this with Puerto Rico I mean
they haven't even recovered from the
hurricane
they're still struggling down there and
they're just worried about getting their
payments on the debt now remember
central bankers they will not bankrupt a
country or a province or state or
anything like that they will make sure
they keep it in limbo where they can
barely get by but they can still make
their interest payments but they have to
push austerity that's where they like
these countries these states these
provinces these areas because if they go
under then all eyes are on the central
bank saying look what you've done here
you destroyed the country you destroyed
this area they don't want that to happen
and that doesn't benefit them in any way
because what they like to do is keep
them operational having the interest
payments come in and it allows them to
buy their real assets using pennies on
the dollar that's their whole strategy
that's their strategy from the beginning
of time and it allows them to control
the country it allows them to control
the area control what is going on there
and we can see right now that the

that's off of them and on to someplace
else the other thing that they're

you have cryptocurrencies and I can tell
